title: Accounts
subtitle: Manage AI Agent authentication accounts
noAccountsHint: Add an AI Agent account to get started
confirmDelete: Delete this account? Authentication data will be cleared.

create.title: Add Account
create.noOnlineNodes: No online nodes. Please start a Node Agent first.
create.nodeHint: Account will be bound to this node (auth data stored locally)
create.nameHint: Used to identify the account, recommend using login email
create.proxyHint: Select proxy for external network access during authentication

auth.title: Account Authentication
auth.webTerminalDesc: Click the link below to open a web terminal and complete the OAuth login flow.
auth.oauthDesc: Click the button below to complete OAuth login in a new tab.
auth.deviceCodeHint: This code is already included in the link, no need to enter manually
auth.retryHint: You can retry authentication. Please check network and proxy settings first.
